text: Nivyamenyekana yuko abo bantu babiri bagize igicumuro, abandi babiri bari muri babasigwa bacumuye kuri ivyo bisigi nibo bazohagarara kuruhande rwabo, barahire kw’izina ry’Imana n’ukuvuga bati:- ukuba kwacu kw’ivyabona nuku kuri cane gusumba ukuba icabona cabo, natwe ntitwahemukiye imitima yacu, mu vy’ukuri kuko aho tuzoba turi mubahemukiye imitima yacu
